Package fr.dudie.nominatim.client

Interface NominatimClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonNominatimClient
    public interface NominatimClient
    Interface to use the Google Maps Service.
    Author:
    Jérémie Huchet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Address getAddress​(double longitude, double latitude)
      Reverse geocode the given coordinates.
      Address getAddress​(int longitudeE6, int latitudeE6)
      A convenience method to do the same as getAddress(double, double) but with int E6 latitude and longitude.
      List<Address> search​(String query)
      Search for results with the given query.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        List<Address> search​(String query)
              throws IOException
        Search for results with the given query.
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        a list of results
        Throws:
        IOException - a communication error occurred

      • getAddress

        Address getAddress​(double longitude,
                   double latitude)
            throws IOException
        Reverse geocode the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        longitude - a longitude
        latitude - a latitude
        Returns:
        an address corresponding to the given longitude and latitude or null if no result found
        Throws:
        IOException - a communication error occurred

      • getAddress

        Address getAddress​(int longitudeE6,
                   int latitudeE6)
            throws IOException
        A convenience method to do the same as getAddress(double, double) but with int E6 latitude and longitude.
        Parameters:
        longitudeE6 - a longitude E6
        latitudeE6 - a latitude E6
        Returns:
        an address corresponding to the given longitude and latitude or null if no result found
        Throws:
        IOException - a communication error occurred
